entries.name: Label Font Size
entries.description: Scale for waypoint label text. 0 is very small and 100 is largest.

entries.name: Label Style
entries.description: 0 = Label Only, 1 = Label + Distance, 2 = Label + Coordinates.

entries.name: Render Distance
entries.description: Current beacon render distance in blocks.

entries.name: Max Render Distance
entries.description: Upper limit for the Render Distance slider in blocks.

entries.name: Near Beacon Fade-out
entries.description: Fade beacons when the player gets close to them.

entries.name: Near Fade End
entries.description: Distance (blocks) where beacon is fully faded out.

entries.name: New Waypoint = Beacon
entries.description: If enabled, newly-created waypoints default to beacon enabled.

entries.name: Hide All Beacons
entries.description: Master toggle for rendering all beacons (true = visible).

entries.name: Show Beams
entries.description: Toggle vertical beam rendering for active beacons.
